content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: Grr, I don't think my phone can handle Twitter.    Its an old Samsung flip phone, standard txt msg, no internet, dino-tech.  lol
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: I haven't used PS since high school (yup, FW guy!), so I opened it now and I feel like a 4 year old in a candy store. Where do I start?
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 3:
Text: I'm starting to wish i was older than what i am
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: Is happy to have got in contact with some old friends via facebook
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: Listening to the sounds of young girls waking the entire neighborhood with their lovely rendition of you've never heard this song before!
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 6:
Text: Love and prayers to David Cook and his family.  His older brother "Adam" lost his battle with Brain Cancer Sunday morning.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: My Catholic faith dwindled as I grew younger and more disappointed that the Church did not take a stand on many human rights issues.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: Now I kno why I don't go shoppin w/ my old man!! Phew! Peace @ last-he garden is callin me!! off to bbq later  hope y'all havin a nice day
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 9:
Text: Omg their younger brother is sucha hero!!!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: One of boys (cats) is not feeling well. He's 15 years old. I hope he's going to be okay!
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: Out eating with old people instead of studying for sats
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: So dinner... decided not to pick up will have delivery. Trying new pizza place as our old one closed
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: Sooooooooooooooooooooo happy birthday to me! im the birthday princess...im old but  cuteeeeeeeeee
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: Today at work I had to serve a middle eastern family and they had a 3 or 4 year old little boy. He was so adorable.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: Watching Bridge to Terabithia with the kids....amazing movie for young and old
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: crying (as alaways) while watching When You're Gone video. The old man...
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 17:
Text: exausted. maybe its the oldness setting in
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 18:
Text: garage sale tomorrow! in DIRE need to dispose old stuff.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: just got out of the movie, going for ice cream  i feel like a five year old & i love it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: just woke up  wants to hang with tay but cant get a hold of her...the day is young tho
Annotation from annotator: 3

Human-rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: "quit, 2 older ladies are behind us" says the 4 eight year olds in front of @triskenikole and i. Sad day!
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 2:
Text: /me sadly says goodbye to his 30-yr old La-z-boy Exec chair.  I tried to make it last as long as I could.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: @ChaiBella We are good!  Just a little PTSD  that's all, My Torsten 14 yrs old Thought it was "Awesome", he was born 1995
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: @CherryVette To old?  Say it ain't so
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 5:
Text: @Lqdtnt Will do, sweets!!! I'm the short one, with the dutchboy bob...chasing a 2 yr old!!!
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 6:
Text: @MiiSs_AhhTeeYaa no probb... Wish I coulda joined ya! But I'm tooo young
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 7:
Text: @MisterRo Pizza? Pah! I have day old sandwiches to chomp on. Mind you, there are *excellent* cake and cookies to follow.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: @PushPlayCJ I miss that old hair CJ1
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: @SHAMfreakinWOW 27. I feel really young now that you say that
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: @andrewspooner Not polite with fools. Must be old age making me less accommodating
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 11:
Text: @datgirlcomedy I read some older twits earlier about the boots on cars and bust out laughing! Macy's sales always disappoint me
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: @enda, so your dad is 3 days younger than mine
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: @gone2dmb yeah i had my old username back then...he's barely been on since the change
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 14:
Text: @kacymooneyham Ok,I deleted m old FB account.And umm,u CAN ACCEPT MY FR?END REQUEST
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 15:
Text: @mitchybits the night is not young
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: All my old friends and new friends are here! Plus people i don't know!  Hahahaha
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: At my favorite old fashioned italian barber shop, its like traveling in time
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: Bah, Star Trek was full  Sitting in Borders filling in time. Catch22 is in the young adult section - WTF?
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: Ernie was Bert's younger brother,and he died from intestinal problems.He had some growths which ruptured and killed him.Poor Ernie.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: I'm older than Ali Lohan, too!
Annotation from annotator:
